articles.title: World Cup 2022: Wales hoping for history repeat after Bale salvages USA draw - BBC
articles.description: Playing at their first World Cup for 64 years, Wales turned to a familiar saviour in Gareth Bale as they pulled a point from the fire in their opening game against the United States.
